messages.subject: Katamori, Teruhime, and Toshihime fanart!!
messages.msgSnippet: Much underappreciated, but here are some fanarts of these wonderful people!! 1. http://bossandrobin.fc2web.com/teruhimesama.htm Teruhime...no words necessary
messages.messageBody:
Much underappreciated, but here are some fanarts of these wonderful
people!!

1. http://bossandrobin.fc2web.com/teruhimesama.htm

Teruhime...no words necessary ^_^

2. http://zikuubokujou.vivian.jp/get1800.jpg

Katamori and Toshihime

3. http://bossandrobin.fc2web.com/meguriai.png

Katamori and Toshihime

4. http://zikuubokujou.vivian.jp/3100kinentosito.jpg

Toshihime

5. http://zikuubokujou.vivian.jp/1syukinen.jpg

Left to right: Harada, Omasa-chan, Toshihime, Katamori

6. http://zikuubokujou.vivian.jp/ringosan1.jpg

Katamori looking like Tetsu.

7. http://zikuubokujou.vivian.jp/ringosan4.jpg

Toshihime as a Western-style princess.

8. http://zikuubokujou.vivian.jp/ringosankatatosi.jpg

Katamori (looking like Tatsu) and Toshihime.

9. http://zikuubokujou.vivian.jp/syotyuget.jpg

1st on left is Katsu Kaishu (I think), 2nd is Katamori, 3rd is Iwakura
Tomomi. Dunno who the others are.

10. http://zikuubokujou.vivian.jp/tigikisan.jpg

Katamori and a sleeping Toshihime ^_^

11. http://www.bushinavi.com/~ponpoko/ill/2004-toshihimenenga.jpg

Toshihime

12. http://www.rinku.zaq.ne.jp/bkbur908/icon-teruhime.jpg

Teruhime...isn't she gorgeous? ^_^

13. http://zikuubokujou.vivian.jp/tonohime0.gif

Gif file of Katamori and Toshihime

14. http://zikuubokujou.vivian.jp/top3.jpg

Toshihime

15. http://zikuubokujou.vivian.jp/400.jpg

Katamori in action!

16. http://zikuubokujou.vivian.jp/9999.jpg

Katamori and Jinbo Shuuri (Yukiko's husband, committed seppuku for
suggesting peaceful submission to Choshuu)

17. http://zikuubokujou.vivian.jp/8888.jpg

Katamori with an axe?!

18. http://zikuubokujou.vivian.jp/24000.jpg

Toshihime (left) and Teruhime

19. http://zikuubokujou.vivian.jp/27272.jpg

Katamori, and Saitou on far left.

20. http://bossandrobin.fc2web.com/katamorinomahoutsukai.htm

Matsudaira hugging a Toshihime plushie!!!

21. http://platicknetwork.cool.ne.jp/mamejika/makoto/top_katamori.html

I LOVE this one...he looks SO awesome...


That's all for now!!

--M.
